title: The Little Witch Wanda
description: This adorable story is about Wanda, a little witch who is always casting silly child spells and forgetting to clean up after herself. One day, her mother was so tired of her behavior that she was punished. Her punishment consisted of going into a village where people are not witches and acting like one of them. No magic, no spells ... nothing. She was not to return until she performed a kind deed for someone.Wanda was very sad but eventually met some very kind children. One little boy wasn't even afraid of witches! With his help, Wanda was able to accomplish her goal of kindness.
author: Mariette Vanhalewijn
